skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: I have extensive knowledge of JavaScript, particularly with ES6+ features. To gain a deep understanding of JS, I focus on what happens under the hood.

skills.title: React
skills.description: I have experience with React, which I’ve used for numerous projects. I am familiar with common React concepts. My principle is to write clean and maintainable code.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.description: Fixing bugs in development rather than in production is key. That’s why I use TypeScript. TypeScript is my primary language for starting a new project.

skills.title: Figma
skills.description: I collaborate with designers using Figma to create high-fidelity UI mockups. Figma allows me to implement designs accurately and ensure smooth communication throughout the development process.

skills.title: GitKraken
skills.description: Version control is essential in modern development, and I’m comfortable using Git to manage code versions. I regularly use Git to collaborate with teams and maintain a clean project history.

skills.title: Google Tag Manager
skills.description: Version control is essential in modern development, and I’m comfortable using Git to manage code versions. I regularly use Git to collaborate with teams and maintain a clean project history.

skills.title: SASS
skills.description: An effective design can encourage customers to buy from you rather than your competitors. I focus on making designs attractive and pleasant.

skills.title: And more
skills.description: Github, Portainer, Proxmox, AWS S3, Docker, etc... I’m always curious and love learning new things. I’m constantly exploring new technologies and am ready to take on new challenges.

description: Hello, I’m Aymeric, a curious Frontend Developer (and sometimes UI Designer) with over 5 years of experience, based in Vitry-sur-Seine. I am always striving to grow and learn something new to create better things and achieve better results. I specialize in Frontend development, with a particular focus on writing functional code that’s business-oriented. I describe myself as a developer who primarily wants to write clean, good code.
